author: {'steamid': '76561197980033770', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1695551610}
review:
I'd played the board game first so had some idea of what to expect before I bought it on substantial discount.

It is short.
It is a bit basic.
It is simplistic.
It doesn't necessarily reflect how the real world works (but then neither do many board or computer games).

If you prefer games that are more detailed, complex and realistic, then this probably isn't the game for you, but if you're after a fairly light hearted challenge, are happy to accept it for what it is, and can pick it up on substantial discount, you should enjoy this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198097976235', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1663920878}
review:
이 게임의 가장 큰 문제는 할게 치료 격리밖에 없다는것도 아니고 질병 종류가 적은것도 아니다.
그냥 승리조건이 치료약 개발 원툴인게 문제인것 같다.
그런데 또 현실 고증으로 치면 질병은 치료약만 나오면 끝이라는게 고증이 잘된걸수도 있겠다.
창작마당에서 모드로 신선한게 나와서 그게 대박치는게 아니라면 게임은 만원주고 사기에 좀 비싼감이있다.
게임 켜자마자 나오는 인트로가 워낙 화려해서 기대하게 만드는데 그게 전부라는게 아쉬운 게임이이다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198180038114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 633, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 633, 'last_played': 1652486229}
review:
Game is either too easy or you need to be lucky for the Ebola scenario on Hard. 
I was able to do the 3 community challenges (the 3 most uncommon achievements at the time of review) in the same game for 3/5 scenarios, and did the 2 that requires medium mode at the same time for the other 2. 

The strategy is the same for all scenarios: rush money centers and then you are pretty much free to win the game. 

Very short game too, expected a bit more from it.

Played 1 hour on purchase to check if it was ok, came back later to fully complete it under 10 hours.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112810429', 'num_games_owned': 2594, 'num_reviews': 578, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 178, 'last_played': 1643667512}
review:
Quarantine is a somewhat short turn-based table game, where you are supposed to fight a globe-scale disease, spreading by the terrorists. Some would add obvious conjunctions with Plague, Inc. - except this game puts you on the right side of the barrier. However, despite some common points, considering the topic of named titles, those two are really different games.

The game pace is quite fast - you'll probably deal with all 5 major scenarios in 3-4 hours of playtime. While the diseases themselves are different, the solution is always the same - isolate the sources as soon as possible, and get more fundings to research the cure as fast as possible... Which, of course, is easier to say than do. Sometimes, though, I was lucky enough to heal the disease without even completing the R&D, just by isolating and treating all the damage fast enough.

Now, speaking of the so-so part, well... There is some inconsistency between how well this game made overall and its size. The user interface, the possible variety of actions and challenges, all that stuff that hooks you to play more, feels somewhat misplaced, considering how quickly this game comes to a complete stall. On the other hand, were the game a bit more complicated, with more cities and more travel routes, and some more randomness spread here and there, it would probably feel much less balanced than it is now. And the overall balance is a kinda rare virtue for modern software (games included) development.

So, I'd say, take it as it is, or walk by. The price is quite decent and fair, for such a short, but nicely made product. My mark is 7/10. A decent game for an evening or two, to try different approaches, complete the achievements, and move to something else.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041174144', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1643383885}

author: {'steamid': '76561198094569058', 'num_games_owned': 731, 'num_reviews': 237, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1638628529}
review:
역병 주식회사를 역으로 해석한 진화하는 전염병에 대처하여
자금을 모아서 치유/격리/연구 하는 게임.
게임 설명할것 없이 트레일러 동영상 보여지는게 전부이다.

아무래도 턴방식이다 보니 플레이 하는 사람에 따라 다르겠지만 
한 시나리오의 게임 길이가 30분 내외인것 같다. 
짧게 즐기는 게임, 가격 대비는 알아서 판단.

author: {'steamid': '76561198145861530', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 405, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 405, 'last_played': 1633173188}
review: Przyjemna, szybka i dosyć prosta gra. Polecam szukającym strategii które nie zabierają dużo czasu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198379437591', 'num_games_owned': 439, 'num_reviews': 130, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1684378576}
review: Достаточно таки занятная игрушка. Раунды меньше чем в том Plague, но это добавляет свой шарм. Пошаговость и создание Агентов по факту делают её более независимой. Если в той же Plague ты действовать исходя из ситуации в реальном времени, то здесь ты можешь более-менее спокойно спланировать свои будущие ходы и продумать примерную стратегию. Да, тут жёсткий рандом "который может поиздеваться ещё в самом начале раскидав все очаги заболеваний". Да, тут есть такие события, что вынудят тебя резко менять схему и перерасчитывать свои дальнейшие ходы. Но всё же проект достоин внимания. Даже с учётом того факта, что Quarantine  по сравнению с вышеупомянутой проходная и ты здесь проведёшь куда меньше времени.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041512403', 'num_games_owned': 1837, 'num_reviews': 2465, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1626852297}
review:
질병관리본부

세계를 위협하는 위험한 질병을 제거하기 위해 지휘를 합니다.
요원들을 고용하고 이동시키고 배치할 수 있으며
질병이 발생한 지역으로 이동시켜서 다양한 작전을 수행하게 합니다.

질병을 치료하여 다른 도시로 전염되는 상황을 방지할 수 있고
자금을 투자하여 도시를 격리시켜 외부로 바이러스가 퍼지는 것을 막을 수 있죠.
전염병의 표본을 채취하고 일정수가 되면 이를 연구하여 치료제를 만들 수 있고(승리 조건)
사무실을 건설하여 자금 획득 증가/ 치유를 통해 작전 수행중에 다친 요원의 체력을 회복시킬 수 있죠.

획득하는 자금을 소모하여 업그레이드를 진행할 수 있으며
이를 통해서 작전 수행 중에 다치는 상황 방지 및 감소하는 체력 하락,
사무실과 요원 최대치 증가, 전염병의 활동력 약화 등이 가능합니다.

외에도 중간중긴 이벤트가 발생하며 이벤트에서의 선택지와 결과에 따라
게임 진행에 크고작은 영향을 주기도 합니다.
안전하게 해결되는 경우도 있고 실패하여 상황이 악화되기도 하죠.

아쉬운 점
-턴 종료 전에 미활동한 경우 경고 좀....

author: {'steamid': '76561198026214575', 'num_games_owned': 524, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1626214461}
review:
Jogando depois da nossa experiencia com a Covid-19, que eles não aproveitaram. Poderiam criar um novo cenário ou dlc, mas nem isso. Existe a possibilidade dos próprios jogadores criarem tal cenário, mas falta engajamento
O game tinha potencial - a produção é boa, a idéia interessante, mas faltou molho, provavelmente algo relacionado à direção. São apenas cinco cenários, abordando diferentes doenças.
O mapa lembra a disposição do War/RISK, mas ao invés de controlar exércitos, você controla quatro tipos de agentes de uma ONG: 1. Segurança - especializado em estabelecer quarentenas, o que retarda a transmissão da epidemia; 2. Médico - especializado em tratar a infecção; 3. Diplomata - especializado em estabelecer sucursais da ong, obtendo apoio dos governos (dinheiro); 4. Cientista - especializado em obter amostras e pesquisar a epidemia.
O objetivo de cada mapa é encontrar a cura de cada epidemia, antes que o mundo inteiro seja infectado. A ação se dá por turnos, onde acontecem eventos aleatórios diversos. Vou jogar mais para tirar minhas conclusões, mas a principio não me parece um game ruim, pena que foi abandonado antes que rendesse alguma coisa.

author: {'steamid': '76561198108311373', 'num_games_owned': 512, 'num_reviews': 184, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1602558874}

author: {'steamid': '76561198177891247', 'num_games_owned': 49, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 506, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 375, 'last_played': 1675572553}
review:
It was an interesting experience like reverse-pandemic; so you're the 'cure' instead of the disease trying to wipe out humanity. The UI and art is very clean and easy to use and understand. Gameplay was just alright for me; for example the random events I wasn't sure how they impacted the overall game like it would say this decision will have future consequences, but it never really affected any of my playthroughs (?) I think the difficulty level is pretty high; I was playing medium level with the Ebola scenario and wiped out pretty hard many times. The trick really is to 'contain' the disease before it spreads over the map. So instead of wiping out humanity through sheer numbers, you have to protect the cities before they turn red. In essence really 'quarantine' everything to a red zone lol.  

It's a very easy to pick up and go kind of game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001537536', 'num_games_owned': 1015, 'num_reviews': 232, 'playtime_forever': 1539, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 784, 'last_played': 1597915123}
review:
[h1]IN A WORD: [b]MAYBE[/b] [/h1] 
[h1]IN SHORT:[/h1]
[quote=]
[b]WHAT TO EXPECT:[/b] Contemporary pandemic setting. Boardgame clone. Elegent design. Basic mechanics. Superficial depth. Narrow strategy options. Repetitive gameplay. Short games, very dependent on difficulty.  Very polished production values. Singleplayer only. Workshop integration but little additional scenarios.
[b]ACHIEVEMENTS:[/b] BALANCED. 
[b]STATUS:[/b] COMPLETE. BUT SHOULD BE IN EA. NOW UNSUPPORTED.
[b]WHEN TO BUY:[/b] ON A BIG SALE.[/quote]

[i]More info below....[/i]

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2415827048
[h1]THE LOWDOWN:[/h1]
Quarantine is essentially a clone of a boardgame called Pandemic [which has its own digital adaptation.]  Its easy to pick and start playing; 1) pick a strain of pathogen. 2) Choose a difficulty.  3) Select a starting specialist. Gameplay takes place on a global map with around two dozen plus cities which vary, depending on the scenario.  The pathogen controlled by the AI then gets to infect a number of cities with a certain level of the strain before the player selects a starting location for their organization's HQ.  

Gameplay continues in alternating turns with the player managing the global situation and the AI taking the role of pathogen.  Each strain has its own coded behaviour and attempts to spread across the globe to eradicate the human population, before the player attempts to find a cure and eradicate it.

During a turn the player can perform a variety of actions.  These include: purchasing more specialists, researching the strain and adopting new technologies.  Specialists are moved from city to city to perform a variety of actions including; treating population to reduce global infection, quarantining cities to slow the spread of the pathogen, gather samples to undertake research and build more offices to generate more funds.  Research aims to find a cure.  While techs make available increased capabilities, efficient infrastructure or cheaper options.  To speed-up both of those actions technicians and researchers can be employed with funds.

There are occasional dynamic events that use up badly needed player resources. These can accelerate the spread of infection if they are not dealt with successfully.  Specialists may receive injuries during actions but can rest to heal themselves.  Each pathogen can also mutate which increases the effort needed to find a cure.  Eradicating the pathogen in the cities or finding a cure through research brings victory.  

The game has Steam Workshop integration from which owners of the game can create and upload their own pandemic scenarios.  There are less than a handful of scenarios.  Only one of which I bothered to try a few times.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2415828694
[h1]THE GOOD:[/h1]
+ Pretty looking graphics.
+ Clean, crisp GUI.
+ Enjoyable for the first half-dozen games. Until gameplay begins to feel stale.
+ Cheap.  Usually available on a hefty sale.

[h1]THE BAD:[/h1]
- Games over to quickly.  Especially on Easy and Medium difficulties.
- Superficial complexity.  Only one scenario on Easy or Normal proved a challenge.
- No great depth to strategy. Required additional mechanics. Unsupported beyond release.
- No multiplayer.  Could have added another dimension with other players responsible for their own corner of the world (office) and more so a player controlling the strain.
- Everything seems overbalanced.  There is little room for maneouvre or tailoring individual strategies. At least for the easier difficulties.

[h1]AND THE REST:[/h1]
* Well implemented mechanics. Missing badly needed depth. Esp. to tech and research elements.
* A decent range of dynamic events. Needed more of them.
* Well conceived scenarios. Just needed more of them. With greater depth.
* Steam workshop could have added more user-made content but for a lack of interest.
* Only mid-game phase seems varied.  Early and End game phases have little variation.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2415825666
[h1]ANALYSIS:[/h1]
Quarantine would seem the perfect title to be playing during these crazy times. At least if it had not been abandoned so quickly after release. The core game is well-designed, well-made with some good production values.  Components meld together to form a very credible representation of coordinating the global response to a pandemic.  The seed of strategic challenge is there but playing what is essentially the same game repeatedly, gets boring fast.  

From the number of scenarios to the depth of mechanics, there just isn't enough content. Games rarely play beyond the first twenty to twenty-five turns. The lack of components meant that while the mid-game phases were enjoyable and challenging, early-game phases seem inherently narrow in nature, while end-game phases tend to fizzle out.  The same tactics can be used to complete almost all the scenarios on easy and normal difficulties.  This makes for a superficial experience.  

Essentially the challenge boils down to a balancing act of; growing the organisation, minimising infection spread and treating infected population to keep the global rate below a threshold.  Beyond this not even the dynamic events or the pathogen mutating can truly change the course of a game. They only serve to delay the inevitable, unless the player is sloppy or new to the game. While the researching of new technology or discovering the DNA of the pathogen to find a cure extends what little gameplay there is, it was no where near enough for me.

The slick interface design and clean graphical polish do not quite make up for the lacking depth of gameplay and lack of features.  Its a real shame because Quarantine isn't bad.  It had the potential seed to be a very good game that I would expect to shine beyond its individual parts.  As it is, it remains a shiny bauble.  One that may attract attention but fades quickly, to be put aside for more meaningful pursuits.  Achievement completion is possible but not that quickly or easily. 

[h1]VERDICT:[/h1]
Therefore I would grudgingly recommend this only on a big sale to anyone who may be interested in a distraction from their usual fare.  Otherwise this can be safely passed unless searching for a game to remind yourselves of this year, 2020 - the year of Covid-19.

[quote=]Thank you for reading. | Find my reviews [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/nourl1/recommended/]here[/url].[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198005391568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 280, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1596788735}
review:
J'ai pris ce jeu sans vraiment savoir à quoi m'attendre; d'aspect extérieur il ressemblait un peu à "Pandemic, the board game", mais une fois qu'on y a joué une ou deux parties force est de constater qu'il est beaucoup plus simple que "Pandemic", pour ne pas dire simpliste.

Vos actions seront assez routinières, faire de la recherche afin d'avoir des compétences améliorées (collecter plus d'échantillons de la maladie, être mieux protégé...), cela se fera par le biais d'un menu "Tech" et n'aura qu'un coût en temps.
Sinon vous déplacerez vos agents sur une carte où les villes sont reliées les unes aux autres, et c'est par ces liaisons que vous vous déplacerez d'une ville à l'autre, mais également que la maladie se déplacera d'une ville à l'autre.
En haut de votre ATC vous aurez une colonne représentant des humains, à chaque ville infectée un humain se remplit, s'ils sont tous remplis avant que vous ayez trouvé un vaccin vous aurez perdu.

Pour trouver un vaccin il faudra collecter des échantillons de la maladie dans des villes atteintes, et une fois le nombre demandé aller dans le menu "labo" et étudier une séquence de la maladie, sachant que certaines pourront muter (vous serez averti de cela dans votre ATH juste à côté de la colonne villes infectées.).

Vous commencerez avec un personnage, à choisir parmi 4 classes (médecin, chercheur, diplomate et sécurité), chacun ayant ses atouts, et pour en obtenir d'autres il faudra payer une coquette somme.
Idem si vous voulez éviter la propagation d'une maladie dans les villes connexes, il faudra alors mettre la ville en quarantaine moyennant finances (ajout d'un bouclier à côté du nom de la ville, qui s'enlèvera si la maladie se propage, et qui pourra être créé plusieurs fois dans la même ville, utile quand une ville est connectée à plusieurs infectées).

Vos finances étant limitées au départ, il vous faudra construire des bureaux afin d'augmenter vos revenus.
Parfois certains évènements se déclencheront dans les villes infectées, et souvent elles demandent financement afin de les résoudre.

Vos actions sont donc toujours les mêmes, déplacement pour mettre en quarantaine, collecter échantillons, enlever 1 au noimbre  d'infection d'une ville, construire un bureau ou vous guérir car aller dans les villes infectées vous enlève des carrés de vie, sans oublier le labo et les technologies.

N'attendez donc pas un jeu exceptionnel et révolutionnaire, vous serez très déçus, mais je vais lui laisser une note positive car pour son petit prix il pourra vous permettre de vous détendre, il faudra cependant vérifier, avec le temps, si la répétitivité ne nuit pas au plaisir de rejouer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198302233876', 'num_games_owned': 778, 'num_reviews': 209, 'playtime_forever': 694, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 413, 'last_played': 1596464555}
review:
Review Quarantine  เกมที่เรานำทีมกำจัดเชื้อโรคให้หมดโลก

หาก Plague Inc เป็นเกมสร้างเชื้อโรคเพื่อล้างเผ่าพันธุ์มนุษย์ Quarantine คงเป็นด้านตรงข้าม ซึ่งเราทำหน้าที่โดยเรานำทีมเพื่อค้นหายารักษาโรต

เมื่อคุณเข้าไปในส่วนของ New Game จะปรากฏโหมดการเล่นอยู่ 6 อย่างสิ่งที่คุณควรเล่นเป็นสิ่งแรกคือ Tutorial  ซึ่งจะสอนการเล่นของคุณซึ่งควรเล่นเมื่อเล่นครั้งแรก นอกจากนั้นเป็นโหมดที่ให้เล่นเชื้อโรคต่างๆ โดยในเกมนี้แค่ 5 แบบด้วยกันและไม่มีการปลดล็อคอะไรเพิ่ม ซึ่งเป็นข้อเสียของเกมที่ีขาดรูปแบบการเล่นที่หลากหลายถึงแม้จะมี workshop ก็ตามแต่ใน workshop นั้นก็ไมไ่ด้มี content มากนัก 

ในแต่ละโหมดนั้นจะแสดงชนิดของเชื้อโรคและคุณสมบัติของเชื้อโรคแต่ละตัวแตกต่างกันออกไปเช่น อาจแพร่กระจายไปเมืองที่ยังไม่ติดเชื้อง่าย หรือ อาจกลายพันธุ์ง่ายเป็นต้น แต่ไม่ว่าคุณจะเล่นตัวอะไรจัดตัดเข้าหน้าจอเลือก Leader  ซึ่งมีอยู่ 4 ตำแหน่งด้วยกันคือ Security ,Medic,Science,Diplomacy  ซึ่งตำแหน่งเหล่านี้จะแตกต่างกันไปและตอนเริ่มเกมนั้นจะให้เทคโนโลยีต่างกันไป

ในตัวเกมนั้นทุกตำแหน่งจะทำได้ทุกหน้าที่แต่ตำแหน่งนั้นอาจมีประสิทธิภาพน้อยกว่าตำแหน่งที่เชี่ยวชาญโดยตรงเช่น
Medic:เชี่ยวชาญในการรักษาโรค
Science:เก็บตัวอย่างเชื้อโรคได้มากกว่าคนอื่นซึ่งสำคัยต่อการรักษา
Diplomacy:สร้าง office ได้ราคาถูก
Security:เชี่ยวชาญด้านปิดเมือง ป้องกันเมืองจากการแพร่ระบาด

ในแต่ละมิชชั่นนั้้นหลักๆคือค้นคว้าหายารักษาโรคและจะแพ้เมื่อแถบการแพร่ระบาดเต็ม

เมื่อเริ่มเกมคุณจะเลือกเมืองเพื่อสร้างออฟฟิสซึ่งเป็นแหล่งเงินทุนของคุณในการทำอะไรต่างๆพร้อมกับโรคที่จะระบาดไปเรื่อยๆในแต่ turn 

ทุก turn เหมือนทุกตำแหน่งสามารถทำได้ในทุกหน้าที่ซึ่งคุณสามารถนำ Security กำจัดเชื้อหรือในเมืองที่ไม่มีเชื้่อโรคเราป้องกันการระบาดโดยใช้ medic ทำการ Quarantine หรือปิดเมืองเพื่อป้องกันการระบาดได้ แต่คุณต้องวางแผนให้ดีเพราะการกระทำต่างๆนั้นใช้เงินซึ่งเริ่มแรกเราได้แค่ 10000 จาก office  

นอกจากเชื้อโรคที่กระจายไปตามเมืองต่างๆทุก turn แล้วยังมีอีเวนท์ต่างๆที่จะโผล่ขึ้นมาเป็นระยะซึ่งอีเวนท์นี้จะส่วนใหญ่จะเป็นอีเวนท์ที่มีเปอร์เซนต์การสุ่มเพิ่มอัตราการกระจายของเชื้อโรคเชื้อโรคในเมืองอาจน้อยลงหรือแพร่กระจายมากขึ้นหรือเราอาจต้องเสียเงินในอีเวนท์นั้น

แต่ทีมของเราไม่ได้มีแค่ความสามารถพื้่นฐานเท่านั้น เรายังสามารถค้นคว้าเพื่อเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพของทีมเราได้เช่นให้สามารถรักษาตัวจนพลังชีวิตเต็มได้ใน turn เดียว ลดอัตราการกระจายของโรค หรือทำให้สร้างออฟฟิสได้เพิ่ม

และสุดท้ายคือจุดประสงค์หลักของเกมคือการหายารักษาโรค ตรงนี้จะอยู่ในส่วนของ lab เมื่อคุณไปจะเจอสิ่งที่เรียกว่า trait ของเชื้อโรคซึ่งแสดงคุณสมบัติของเชื้อโรคซึ่งตรงนี้เราต้องมีตัวอย่างของเชื้่อโรคตามที่กำหนดไว้เพื่อค้นคว้าหาวิธีกำจัด trait แต่ละ trait  เพื่อให้ค้นพบยารักษาโรค

แต่มันไม่ใช่เรื่องง่ายเพราะในเกมนั้นจะมีระบบการกลายพันธุ์ซึ่งแต่ละเทิรน์นั้นเชื้อโรคจะสะสมค่าการกลายพันธุ์ เมื่อถึงจุดนึงแล้ว trait จะปรากฏเพิ่มขึ้นทำให้เราเสียเวลาในการคิดค้นยาไปอีก และอย่าลืมเราต้องแข่งกับเวลาเพราะแถบการแพร่ระบาดเต็มเมื่อไหร่ เราจะแพ้ 

นี่คือทั้งหมดของเกมนี้นะครับสำหรับเกมนี้ผมคงบอกได้ว่า
“ตัวเกม concept ดีแต่ขาดความหลากหลายในการเล่นและ content น้อย ไป ถ้าปรับปรุงตรงนี้ได้จะดีอีกมาก”6.5/10 lingnoi_401

อย่าลืมติดตามเพจผมด้วยนะครับ เพจแนะนำเกมสำหรับผู้ผลิตรายเล็กๆ
https://www.facebook.com/lingnoigamer/

author: {'steamid': '76561198194995421', 'num_games_owned': 107, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 885, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 878, 'last_played': 1592395216}
review:
[h1] Неплохое развлечение на 14 часов , с отличной задумкой и средним исполнением[/h1]
Так как я увлекаюсь микробиологией, то мне очень интересны игры про инфекции. И очень понравился Plague Inc. Когда я узнал о этой игре, то меня очень заинтересовала игра, ибо выглядело это как другая сторона Plague Inc, а сценария, где мы должны вылечить инфекцию, тогда не было даже в помине (да и сейчас его также нет). 14 часов. Именно столько мне понадобилось, чтобы получить все ачивки в игре и пройти все созданные сообществом сценарии. Самое плохое в этом, что игра находилась на стадии тестирования, но я купил её уже когда она вышла в доступ. Получается, что контента было ещё меньше, а с выходом, но добавилось чуть чуть ещё и всё.
[h1] Геймплей [/h1]
Геймплей представляет из себя пошаговую стратегию. Где мы, играя за всемирную организацию биобезопасности "Pandemic Defence", должны отправлять своих агентов по миру, чтобы сдержать пандемию, найти лекарство и спасти человечество. На выбор у нас: врачи, учёные, дипломаты, специалисты по безопасности. Врачи гораздо лучше лечат болезнь в городах, учёные получают больше проб, дипломаты дешевле строят новые отделы нашей организации. Специалисты по безопасности дешевле и надежнее вводят карантин. К сожалению, наша организация к пандемии не готова. Всего один штаб, и один агент, поэтому действовать надо прямо во время пандемии. Не стоит забывать что агентов мы нанимаем за деньги. Карантин тоже стоит денег, новые учёные для лаборатории тоже стоят денег, поэтому их надо экономить. Стоит помнить, что каждый агент за ход может сделать одно действие.
Инфекция же будет делать следующие: усилятся (увеличивать количество зараженных в городе), распространяться (заражать новые города). И чем больше заболевших, тем больше действий будет делать инфекция. Также на количество действий инфекции влияет и её свойства (симптомы, переносчики, пути передачи), и сам тип патогена (бактерия, вирус, прион, грибок). Помимо инфекции, палки в колёса нам будут вставлять деб, ой то есть конспирологи, верящие в то, что мы выдумали эту инфекцию, альтернативная медицина со своими "исцеляющими кристаллами", якобы лечащими новую инфекцию и PlaceboFarm'ы со своими фуфлоферонами, без доказанной эффективности. На помощь к нам приходит наша лаборатория, где на основании полученых проб, мы исследуем заболевание и создаём лекарства и вакцины, и инженерный отдел с технологиями помогающими нам бороться с инфекцией. Такая вот интересная задумка игры кажется, и это бесспорно плюс, но что на деле? Получилось ли всё это реализовать?
1. Виды патогенов особо друг от друга не отличаются. Например, чаще мутирующий вирус, всё равно может и не мутировать на лёгких сложностях, а на высоких, просто сделает это раньше других. Грибки, почти не будут усилятся, но заполонят 80% доступных городов, а Эбола слишком перебафана.
2. Инженерный отдел бесполезен на 90%. + 1 отдел и + 1 агент, осведомление, которое даёт - 1 к распостранению болезни, всё остальное бесполезно, да и игра заканчивается быстрее чем ты успеешь изучить более трёх технологий, ибо вкладываться лучше в учёных, ибо цель игры найти лекарство. Кстати об этом. В игре есть технология "Дезинфекция", которые не позволяют болезни усиливаться в городе, если заражение в нем снизить до нуля. Это позволяет сделать так, что уровень болезни, в мире 0, ибо болезни не от куда распостраняться, ибо все города продезинфицированы. Инфекция искоренена, но игра не завершается, ибо концовки две, выход пандемии из под контроля или найденное лекарство, а можно было бы реализовать и третью концовку.
3. События. Большинство из событий - это просто временные трудности, которые можно решить тремя способами с определённым риск провалить их. Каждый способ даёт определённые бонусы. Деньги, снижение заражения или введение карантина. Некоторые события "могут иметь последствия в будущем", но ни до одних последствий я не дошёл. Ибо игра заканчивается быстрее чем успеет пройти определённое событие и его последствия.
4. Менеджмент. Карантин вводить почти бессмысленно. Ибо великий рандом может решить, что болезнь должна пойти из другого города. Очень редки случаи, что случайно введенный карантин спасает в конце игры, но это такое исключение и редкость. Во всём остальном вкладываться нужно только в агентов и учёных в лаборатории.
5. Агенты. Что учёный, что дипломат, что специалист по безопасности, что врач, могут и лечить и вводить карантин и открывать отдел, что собирать пробы, просто если действие соответствует его компетентности, то делает это он более эффективно. Из-за этого теряется концепция уникальности каждой профессии. Конечно, я понимаю, что дипломаты бесполезны после постройки всех отделов, но можно было бы придумывать ещё какое-то действие для них, вроде урегулирования различных конфликтов.
Задумка у игры хороша, но вот реализация средняя.
Думаю главный минус игры, катастрофическая малость контента.
5 сценариев, 3 сложности и всё. Никаких тебе сражений против реальных болезней, или альтернативных миров (как в той же Plague Inc). Нет даже возможности самому настроить болезнь, которая будет против тебя. Среди пользовательских контентов вышло слишком скудное количество контента, поэтому на всё у меня ушло лишь 14 часов.
Стоит ли брать? Если вам не равнодушна тематика инфекций, или хочется поиграть в альтернативный Plague Inc, то определённо, по скидочке можно взять. Я лично ожидал смесь Plague Inc и XCOM, где нам пришлось бы летать по миру, выполнять задания, но ожидания не оправдались. Жалею ли я что купил игру? Нет, брал по скидке, да и в целом 14 часов игры насладился. Жалко конечно, могло быть и лучше, ведь игра столько находилась на стадии тестирования, на котором менялся только дизайн и почти не добавлялось контента.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072450805', 'num_games_owned': 438, 'num_reviews': 799, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 379, 'last_played': 1590000872}
review:
Zdaniem Fidelio: Quarantine to gra w sam raz na czasy pandemii koronawirusa. Takie Plague Inc, ale vice versa czyli wersja odwrócona - tutaj nie wcielamy się w rolę wirusa, lecz w rolę ludzi, którzy mają powstrzymać epidemie najbardziej zabójczych wirusów i bakterii, jakie zna świat. I muszę przyznać, że ta gra wciąga - łatwiej utożsamić się z ludźmi niż z wirusem. A technicznie też bardzo dopracowana. Quarantine niestety nie jest zbyt popularna, a szkoda, bo to klimatyczna symulacjo-strategia w fajnym survivalowym klimacie.

Plusy:

+ krótkie, ale intensywne intro
+ klimatyczna, budząca niepokój muzyka 
+ atrakcyjne wizualnie rozlewanie się choroby po globie
+ ładna komiksowa, rysowana grafika (zwłaszcza mapa świata)
+ scenariusze w większości oparte na prawdziwych epidemiach
+ 5 kampanii (Superbakteria, Ospa Prawdziwa, prion Kuru, Ebola z Conakry, Mykotoksyna)
+ intuicyjny i przemyślany interfejs oraz sterowanie (bez niepotrzebnego skomplikowania)
+ 4 klasy postaci - dyplomata (zakłada bazy do zbierania kasy), medyk (leczy ludzi), naukowiec (zbiera próbki do analizy, żołnierz (wprowadza kwarantannę)    
+ wydarzenia losowe w grze, które mogą nam pomóc lub zaszkodzić 
+ dywersyfikacja zadań (zarządzanie kasą, wprowadzanie kwarantanny, leczenie ludzi, analizowanie DNA wirusa)
+ gra buduje świadomość (epidemia wirusa to nie bułka z masłem i trudno ją powstrzymać)
+ dobrze zbalansowane poziomy trudności 
+  gra typu easy to enter, hard to master 
+ bardzo dobre efekty dźwiękowe 
+ społecznościowe achievmenty
+ niższa cena niż Plague Inc.
+ wygodny tutorial

Minusy: 

- gra nie jest zbyt długa
- brak scenariusza z koronawirusem ;)
- w finale mogłoby być coś bardziej efektownego
- menu i plansze ładowania przypominają trochę mobilne gry

Komu polecam? / Komu odradzam?

+ polecam uważającym, że pandemie to nic poważnego (efekt edukacyjny)
+ polecam graczom ceniącym wygodny, bardzo przejrzysty interfejs w strategii
- odradzam graczom, którzy szukają długiej i rozbudowanej strategii 

Rada 1: 

Quarantine ma doskonale zaprojektowany interfejs - polecam wszystkim deweloperom robiącym strategie, by uczyli się, jak należy robić intuicyjny interfejs i czytelną mapę.

Rada 2: 

Niektórzy bardziej cenią Plague Inc., które było pierwsze, ale... jednak granie w roli wirusa, by zabić całą ludzkość to nie jest coś, co chciałoby się robić na dłuższa metę. Według mnie Kwarantanna jest troszkę lepsza, może też ze względu na bardzo dobre dopracowanie interfejsu i strony audiowizualnej. 

Rada 2: 

Życie potrafi nas zaskoczyć i obecna epidemia koronawirusa jest okazją do popularyzacji tej niepozornej gry. Do twórców ze Sproing - dodajcie scenariusz oparty na obecnej pandemii koronawirusa SARS Cov-2. Warto wykorzystać tę wyjątkową sytuację, by spopularyzować Quarantine.

Podobne gry: Plague Inc.

+ Steam Kurator Fidelio de Krytyk: ➥ https://store.steampowered.com/curator/10437106/

review: Это довольно хорошая игра про лечение заразы, атаковавшей мир. Купил я её ещё до шумихи с коронавирусом, но "распаковал" только сейчас. В итоге я получил захватывающий геймпей на 10-15 часов, открыв все достижения, кроме самых жестоких по отношению к себе. Рекомендую к покупке!

author: {'steamid': '76561198052290924', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 336, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1586277832}
review:
Très sympa en terme d'ambiance, avec des parties courtes ce qui met dans l'état d'esprit d'urgence mais une trop courte durée de vie. En 3 à 4 heures maximum le tour du jeu est fait. 
Il y à plusieurs scénarios et trois niveaux de difficulté mais la mécanique du jeu reste la même. Elle est simple, ce qui est un plus pour la prise en main mais trop simple et pas assez variée pour créer une longue durée de vie. 
Un 3 sur 5 si le prix de vente n'est pas trop élevé.

author: {'steamid': '76561198972749017', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1044, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1662401616}
review:
Un videojuego muy entretenido cuya jugabilidad se basa meramente en estrategia.

Sin duda te la posibilidad de utilizar multitud de estrategias para acercarte a tu victoria , las rutas y decisiones son fundamentales para el desarrollo de la enfermedad y también de la cura.

Le veo un muy buen futuro, solo que me gustaría que todos los personajes tuvieran voz propia, además estaría genial si hubiera un VS que te permitiera modo ONLINE.

MUY RECOMENDADO UN JUEGAZO hehe

("Saludos")

review: Glad I got it on sale. The kernel of a good game is here, but it feels timely but like an unfinished mobile game in March 2020. It's too easy, and doesn't have much replayability. Try Plague Inc or Rebel Inc instead. Those are much more dynamic games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198370761989', 'num_games_owned': 72, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 975, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 947, 'last_played': 1584901123}
review: A strategy with a heavy boardgame feeling. Each game is pretty quick, perfect for a small work break.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969602709', 'num_games_owned': 403, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1584893911}
review: Don't expect a highly complex and ambitious game. But with what the game delivers you get a solid round strategy game similar to some board games and sending you in a nice infection scenario. The the difficulty level is changing a bit to harsh when switching from easy to medium or even hard. Also the game lags of variety in scenario, staff, research options, reaction measures.. ah pretty much in every term. Just keep in mind it's a small game on which you need only 1-2 hours to have seen all it offers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198127666640', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1583613661}
review:
Honestly, all of the reviews say that this game is easy but I don't know if my version is broken or something? I'm a bit baffled. The tutorial hardly gives you any advice and then tells you that you are fine.

I was not fine. I've played this for about two hours and find myself confused. I start Bacteria on easy and do alright. I go to normal and cannot beat it. Seriously, I start with one operative and only get to make one turn while the disease - which starts in three separate locations, holy jesus - makes several; 2 to 3 to 4. Easily, I get overwhelmed while trying to treat/quarantine. Can I get any help here? What am I missing? (I don't mean to sound like a complete wimp as I have played Plague Inc, which is why I am even here. I've beaten Plague on Mega Brutal and all. Just wow. This blows my mind that I can't grasp this.)

Despite my puzzling and all, I feel that this is worth getting for the price offered. This game seems like it has a ton of potential too. The art and voice acting really seem to draw you in. The scenarios are interesting and cool. However, if it has been given up on, I don't know what else to say. That's a shame, really.

author: {'steamid': '76561198316317550', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 420, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 263, 'last_played': 1616817283}
review: 还可以吧，游戏对于这个价格有一点贵，但总体来说是值得的；回合制游戏蛮好玩的，里面的元素很多，要协调、要思考的东西很多，但玩完所有模式以后就只能吃灰了，不像瘟疫公司一样（成就也是可以试着打一打的）

author: {'steamid': '76561198866440240', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1582105727}
review: 挺有趣且简单的回合类棋小游戏，但与原价相似的瘟疫公司根本无法相比。游戏恐怕不会再更新，如果对这一题材感兴趣的可以入，如果只是寻找反向瘟疫公司还是不必了

author: {'steamid': '76561198076873743', 'num_games_owned': 5239, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 917, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 917, 'last_played': 1581726264}
review:
As I played this game I just felt like the developers really wasted a lot of potential this game had by giving up on it too soon.  I'm not sure what the reasons for this were.  

The game has good art.  The limited voice acting is well done.  The UI looks decent on most screens however some important information could have been added in some spots.  The gameplay is fun for awhile and then wears off because more complexity needed added.  Whether the developers wanted to build on the rpg type elements or just the gameplay itself would have really put this game at a point where it making the players happy and is selling more copies on steam. Content like more official scenarios, a better way to get player added content to the workshop, or even a pvp or pve gamemode.  Even just small balance challenges would have helped to the different build paths (medic path op) and showed that the developers didn't completely giveup on this game after like 1 update from Early Access.

I wanted to give this a thumbsdown for the developers abandoning the game and clearly not caring after disappointing sales in early access and release but the game is too good with its given potential and around 10-15 hours of entertainment going for 100% achievements and experimenting with different build paths in hard mode.  $10 is too much for this game but if you get it in a good sale or cheap bundle then its worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076090874', 'num_games_owned': 522, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1581600793}
review:
우한폐렴(또는 코로나 바이러스)이 창궐하는 이 시국에, 이 게임을 사 둔 게 떠올라서 플레이했습니다.
시국이 시국이라 그런지 뭔가 그냥 게임이라도 확 와닫는 느낌이라 재밌게 플레이했네요.

게임 자체는 재밌습니다만, 볼륨감이 너무 적은 게 흠이네요. 게임이 원패턴으로 흐를 수 밖에 없는 구조라 아쉽습니다.
게임요소를 조금만 더 궁리했으면, 이보다는 좀 더 플레이할 수 있는 게임이 되었을 텐데...

예를 들어, 외교관은 초반 이후엔 가지고 있는 스킬이 쓸 데가 없어져서 잉여처럼 느껴지곤 합니다.
그런데 중간 게임 이벤트 발생 시에, 선택지들에 이미 확률이 정해져 있어서 선택하는 거 외엔 할 수 있는 게 없는데, 여기서 그 지역으로 외교관을 보내면 교섭 선택지의 성공률이 올라간다거나 비용이 감소한다든가 하는 효과를 주는 식으로 좀 더 플레이할 수 있는 요소를 넣을 수도 있었을 겁니다.
또는 갑작스레 환자가 늘어나는 이벤트가 발생한 지역에는 과학자를 보내서 일정 턴 연구를 할 수 있는데, 과학자를 보내 연구시키면 연구점수를 더 많이 주고, 과학자를 안 보내면 일정 턴 후 변종이 발생한다는 식으로 이지선다를 줄 수도 있었겠죠.
또는 사무소 다섯 채 지으면 끝이 아니라, 각 사무소에 연구시설을 증설한다든가 하는 식으로 요소를 추가할 수도 있었을 겁니다.
  그런 식으로 플레이 요소를 더 추가할 수도 있었을 텐데, 그런 게 부족해서 아쉽네요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198814828928', 'num_games_owned': 385, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1580709223}

author: {'steamid': '76561198012587463', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1580683586}
review:
Honestly? I like the game. I really do. But like so many others have said, after a couple games, it kinda peters out. There's nothing really to hook you into staying. The playstyle is simple and systematic, almost no random elements whatsoever. Sure there's "chance" factors that X may or may not happen or Y may or may not fail. But it's all predictable, and the events in question are limited.

I think more than the game itself? I like the theme. I like the twist on what made "Plague Inc" a success that even after nearly a decade (At LEAST a full decade if you count the original flash game that the Plague Inc we have today was based off of), and I like the ability to play the flipside of the story. But after a while it becomes monotone. What once seemed impossible to beat becomes largely predictable to the point you have to TRY to fail.

Overall I'd rather spend the money I spent on Quarantine on games at a run-down arcade, or even mobile games (I'm not a mobile gamer). I want to write a good review. I really do. But as the game is now, I can't in good conscience write a good review. I sincerely hope the developer is more successful with their future projects.

author: {'steamid': '76561198237393568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1634, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 265, 'last_played': 1699030853}
review: Su questa piattaforma vedo troppe recensioni negative per futili motivi o totale mancanza di materia grigia, ed è per questo che voglio spezzare una lancia a favore di Quarantine. Non aspettatevi un gioco da AAA. È semplicemente un gioco strategico! Uno strategico a turni niente male, non tanto complesso, e abbastanza fluido e veloce, ma come per tutti i giochi strategici bisogna avere ed utilizzare un po' di cervello, altrimenti dedicate il vostro tempo a giochi meno "impegnativi". Anche senza sconti è un buon gioco nel rapporto qualità/prezzo, se poi lo prendete in offerta è ancora meglio!

author: {'steamid': '76561198024556664', 'num_games_owned': 494, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 1341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 513, 'last_played': 1666510920}
review: Due to price point it gets a pass. 9.75USD is a great price for this game.  I have put 8.5 hours into this game and very much intend to play more and can quite comfortably say that i will put in at least 20 hours. The only gripe is it does get a bit same same. It is however quite challenging with different scenarios and although i have only played on medium i am sure hard level will make it even more challenging. If i put 20 hours in which i am sure i will thats less than 50 cents an hour to be entertained so you can't complain about that. Great price and all things considered its a good game

review: 玩法枯燥，实际的剧情并没有让玩家有过紧张，从一开始就执着的封锁周边城市是最好的方式；同时放弃一个大区域同时调取一个另外两个大区域的资源为这个被放弃的大区域做实际辅助，最后就只剩下枯燥的封锁研究 ，回合刷钱。总的来说9元的价格其实也有些让我感觉到枯燥，没有对病毒的指向型建设，只是个大概的模拟，没有建立起完整的游戏内部对于防疫的描写。

author: {'steamid': '76561198141879610', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1578782223}
review: Function similar to Plague Inc, but instead of causing viral apocalypse, the player is trying to prevent it. The concept is good, the execution is mediocre at best, the trailer might look similar to plague inc, but it doesn't have the same level of difficulty and replayability of plague inc. The game felt rushed and unfinished, it's not exactly an outbreak sim, if you control several agents and key location on the map, you almost can't lose. Game is also really short too, like I said, good concept, bad execution.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005182795', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 301, 'last_played': 1577765682}
review:
So the game is fun. It's a bit too basic for hardcore or even moderate strategy geeks. I beat all the scenarios on medium in less than 4 hours, then tried one on hard just to see if it was any harder. It honestly didn't feel significantly different. 
So here's the issues with the game:
1. Difficulty spikes early in each level, and if you can make it past that, you're almost guaranteed a win as long as you don't do anything dumb.
2. Only one strategy seems worth pursuing. Start as a diplomat, ignore disease until you get all possible HQ built. Research Body Armor first. Then hire a medic, two security guys (or a second medic if the level doesn't have two security guys). Research Improved tactics or whatever it is that gives you a 5th team slot. You should be able to have a team of 5 by about turn 8-12. At that point the rest of the research is a bit of a formality, but I recommend going straight down the first tree, because the final tech's +1 to all quarantines basically makes the endgame easy mode. Then you just have to get out in front of the disease with your quarantines (by turn 12 you should never need to worry about money again, an income of 50,000 a turn is enough for every one of your agents to use quarantine every turn.) If you can cut off the disease's path to other continents at choke points, the game becomes easy whack-a-mole. 
3. Sort of related to point 2, but the diseases have very little real variation. A couple of minor stat differences in the way they spread is about it. You probably won't find yourself changing your strategy for any of them. 
The strategy I outlined in 2 worked fine for a virus on Hard, despite the disease's starting locations being on 3 different continents. In fact, I finished with over a million dollars, 41 spare disease samples that I gathered just because I didn't have anything better to do with some of my operatives, and literally every city in the world quarantined. Not because I needed to, just because I wanted to see if there was an achievement for it (sadly there isn't.) 
It should be noted here that I am NOT a hardcore strategy gamer. I rarely play games on hard at all. So if I'm able to trash levels on hard with no problem... the game is pretty easy. That said, I paid a buck for it, and I got about 5 hours of decently fun entertainment for it. So yeah, as long as you can get it on sale, I do recommend it...just not if you're a hardcore strategy geek. Anybody expecting a hard challenge here will definitely be disappointed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008107842', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 925, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1569779839}
review:
블루 전염병 마블

거창해보이지만 생각보다 할게 그다지 없다.
두번째부터 재미 없다고 하는데 솔직히 그럴 필요도 없다.
쉬움으로 한번 밀어보니까 걍 다음이 어떨지 뻔하더라.

마치 시식코너에서 한입 먹어봤더니 익숙하고 흔해서
집에 사두고 먹을만한 맛은 아닌게 느껴지는 그런 느낌이다.

난이도를 올려봤자 어떻게 어려워질지 뻔히 그려지고
몇판을 더 해도 새롭고 재미있는 변칙성 진행은
기대하기 어려운게 눈에 딱 보인다.

인구수에 의하거나 도시의 특색에 의해 일어나는
이벤트같은것도 없는게 가장 큰 문제인것 같다.

그 이전에 전체적으로 너무 단순화 되어있다.

보드게임의 느낌을 낸건 알겠는데
보드 게임이라도 이벤트를 신박하게 낼 방법은 많고
하물며 얼마든지 이벤트를 추가 할 수 있는 PC게임에서
부르마블 황금열쇠급 단순함을 보여주니....

요원들이 할수있는것도 6가진데 실질적으로는
3가지라고 볼수있다. 격리,치료,표본
나머지 이동,사무실,회복은 큰 의미가 없다

이동은 그냥 아무 행동 없이 이동하는거고
사무실은 해당 도시에 한번 지으면 땡인 기능이고
회복은 요원 회복이라 아무지역에서나 가능하다.
전염병에 관련하여 행동하는게 사실상 3개뿐

요원들 스킬 뚫는것도 각 특성별 트리가 있는게 아니라
그냥 4개씩 있는게 전부고 연구 속도도 돈 부으면 끝
전염병 연구도 포인트 모아서 돈부으면 끝....

단점을 얘기 하려면 더 나올거 같지만...
굳이 말 안해도 이게 뻔한 게임이라는건 충분히 말한거 같다.

추천한 사람들도 정가구매 추천을 안하는 이유가 있다.

얼리때 할게 없다는 평가가 있는데 생각해볼게 둘중 하나다.
지금보다 할게 더 없었다. 혹은 게임 플레이에 대한 패치가 없었다.
내 생각엔 후자가 아니면 제정신이 아닌거 같고.

그리고 창작마당으로 마음대로 해보세요 하고 던져준거 같은데
업로드 된 모드는 단 5개. 중복빼고 샘플 빼면 남는건 단 3개.
발전 가능성이 있어야 모드를 만들테니...

author: {'steamid': '76561198013357890', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1486826588}
review:
Quarantine. Ogni volta che questo titolo mi pare davanti gli occhi nella libreria, ricordo tristemente di essere stato infinocchiato da questi pseudo sviluppatori con un gioco vuoto e per nulla originale, che per smartphone avrebbe avuto quasi senso, ma al prezzo di acquisto su Steam, NO. Pubblicato e abbandonato. Il peggiore acquisto che io abbia mai fatto.

Ho saputo che entro il mese si potranno rivendere i giochi dalla libreria Steam.
Grazie al cielo. Non vedo l'ora di sbarazzarmene; sperando che qualche masochista lo compri.

author: {'steamid': '76561198312608537', 'num_games_owned': 63, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1585325011}
review: Eu curti bastante o jogo, ele lançou recentemente falta muitas coisas, claro, porém, queria deixar uma sugestão, podiam fazer um modo multiplayer no qual um jogador cria a doença e o outro tenta erradicá-la, e também um modo co-op, no qual uma doença devastadora surge em diversos lugares ao redor do mundo e você e alguém tentam erradicá-la

author: {'steamid': '76561198000715622', 'num_games_owned': 1356, 'num_reviews': 167, 'playtime_forever': 475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 475, 'last_played': 1566619029}
review: This game is a little basic, but it delivers what it set out to do, and it's a decently enjoyable few hours grinding out the achievements. Is it perfect, no, the thing I would most like to see is a bit more 'context' to the disease, so you can see how your actions or lack thereof are having an impact on people's lives, but overall, I enjoyed it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006246233', 'num_games_owned': 2343, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1561821081}
review:
Quarantine ist ein einfach zu lernendes aber vielleicht schwer zu meisterndes Spiel. Zumindest auf "Leicht" ist es leicht einen Einstieg zu finden. Der Text ist gut übersetzt und leicht zu verstehen. Die handgezeichneten Grafiken sehen prima aus und geben dem Spiel eine entsprechende Atmosphäre. Die Hintergrundmusik rundet das ganze ab.
Dem Tutorial ist leicht zu folgen und man kommt schnell ins Spiel.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996608804', 'num_games_owned': 706, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1560808966}
review: Has solid gameplay.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007258720', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1560128218}
review:
At first I thought this game is pretty fun. Well it is for 2 hours or so, then it gets repetetive real fast. 

Also on higher difficulties I get the feeling that you are entirely dependent on winning every rng event or you lose immidiatly.
Many design decisions also dont make a lot of sense. The operatives can die for example, then they are gone completly no way of getting them back. But if even one of them dies that basicly means you lost anyway so why not flash the defeat screen right there.

In conclusion this game gets boring real fast because its a game where you dont really get to do very much aside from reacting to random events. You will feel very passive while playing this cause the game is designed that way. If you want a game focused around deseases but a lot more fun get plague inc.

review: Dead game, repetitive and unbalanced. Not worth buying at all. Bought into the hype from some YouTuber some time ago and regret it. Play Pandemic: American Swine instead; it's better balanced, more thought out and most importantly free.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010727261', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 134, 'playtime_forever': 80, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1556357700}
review:
Ja Plague Inc ist eindeutig eine bessere Wahl und Quaratine ist nur im Sale zu empfehlen. 
Eigentlich will ich gar nicht so viel zu dem Spiel sagen, da das meiste schon in anderen Reviews gesagt wurde.

Ich sag es mal so, es ist ein kleines Spiel, mit wenig Content und Möglichkeiten.
Ihr habt ein Ziel, und zwar Krankheiten bekämpfen, es ist auch recht schwierig (Je nach Schwierigkeitsgrad) muss ich sagen, da sich die Krankheiten wirklich schnell verbreiten, und man dies ja verhindern soll. 
Aber wenn man den dreh mal raus hat dann sind die 5 Szenarien zügig durch. 

Es ist wirklich eines dieser Spiele wo man 1x kurzen Spaß dran hat, und dann wieder vergisst, hier haben die Entwickler einfach zu wenig geliefert. 

Fazit: 
Ist es schlecht: Nein
Ist es empfehlenswert: Vollpreis nein, Sale Ja 
Wiederspielwert: Nein

author: {'steamid': '76561197983042139', 'num_games_owned': 234, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1555829754}
review: I bought this when it was on sale, since it presents itself as a cross between Plague, Inc & the board game Pandemic.  Unfortunately, it's a half-baked bug filled mess.  I could never play through a full game because I was unable to click the buttons to research tech advances or any lab research.  Even though it left "Early Access" it still has game breaking bugs.  It's April 2019 now.  Maybe it'll be patched to be playable by Christmas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036176076', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4382, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1554795765}
review: Эта игра яркая помесь Пандемии и Plague Inc. Играть в нее почти так же весело, как и проигрывать.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965294986', 'num_games_owned': 2180, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 523, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 523, 'last_played': 1552945054}
review:
Un Plague Inc. à l'envers mais avec beaucoup moins de contenu, une durée de vie assez faible (malgré le Steam Workshop) et une difficulté qui ne posera pas trop problème à ceux qui veulent tout débloquer. Le jeu est quand même bien fait, le principe est plutôt cool et le gameplay très simple.
Parfois le côté aléatoire du jeu peut aider énormément, parfois ça peut faire capoter une bonne stratégie mais ce n'est jamais trop compliqué de s'en sortir si on sait maîtriser la pandémie avant qu'elle ne s'éparpille trop.
Attention : le jeu n'a pas été mis à jour depuis 2017, aucun nouveau contenu ne verra le jour (à part sur le Workshop).

author: {'steamid': '76561198121032870', 'num_games_owned': 1001, 'num_reviews': 148, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1552966595}
review:
Game was fun for about two hours.  I don't really remember purchasing it, so I must have gotten it in a bundle or something.

The game itself plays well, but the 10-20 minute maximum game time is terrible & the same gameplay throughout scenarios get's tedious.  Certain strategies are blatantly unbalanced & in higher difficulties, pretty much necessities to use.
There is no variety in gameplay.

I'd played 4 or 5 games & it already felt incredibly repetitive.  
It's well executed but it's such a basic level of gameplay it hurts.  
I don't have much else to say. 
Don't buy this unless you get a very good deal.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028729671', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1546657351}
review: shallow.  it is a Plague ripoff that is novel is some ways but very shallow.  overall it is very easy and you'll run through it all in about 90 minutes.  depending on the price this may be worth an hour and a half's entertainment.  up to you. no real technical complaints but mechanics wise very linear, independent of the window dressing that the game tries to distract you with.  I wish that I had a neutral option because the game is what it is and it does it well enough but again, you will get about 90 minutes of entertainment out of it.  I've paid more for worse movies that may not have entertained me as well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000351285', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 141, 'playtime_forever': 138, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1551384952}
review: Ist ein sehr simples Rundenstrategiespiel, was sich gut für zwischendurch eignet. Allerdings ist die Anzahl der Szenarien leider sehr gering, sodass man das Spiel eigentlich in einer Stunde komplett durch hat - gut, man kann natürlich noch verschiedene Schwierigkeitsgrade ausprobieren, die ändern aber eigentlich nix am Gameplay, welches generell in seinen Möglichkeiten stark begrenzt ist. Ich kann das Spiel empfehlen, da es mich gut unterhalten hat, ABER im Sale. Angesichts der Spieldauer sind 10 Euro zu viel. Ich hab soweit ich mich erinnere 3-4 Euro gezahlt, dafür ist's okay.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043118900', 'num_games_owned': 1324, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 679, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 679, 'last_played': 1549060196}
review:
Kurzweiliges Rundenstrategie-Spiel. Es ist im Prinzip ein "Worker-Placement"-Spiel, bei dem man sein Personal (anfangs 1 Spezialsist, bis zu 5 kann man beschäftigen) auf der Weltkarte bestimmten Aufgaben für eine Runde zuweist. Je nach Personal-Typ erledigen diese Ihre Aufgabe mehr oder weniger erfolgreich. Ein Wissenschaftler entnimmt beispielsweise 2-3 Proben für die Forschung, während ein Sanitäter oder Soldat immer nur eine liefern kann. Dafür kann der Sanitäter 2-3 Infektionen pro Stadt heilen, der Wissenschaftler nur eine. Der Soldat stellt eine Stadt mit besserem Schutz unter Quarantäne als der Sanitäter es tut.
So entsendet man seine Spezialisten in jeder Runde zu einer anderen Stadt um die Seuche einzudämmen, zu bekämpfen oder weitere Stützpunkte zu bauen. Jede Aktion kann den Spezialisten auch Energie kosten, die er zwischenzeitluch durch NIchtstun ausgleichen sollte, sonst stirbt er. 
Zwischendrin sorgen Ereignisse im Multiple-Choice-Verfahren für Überraschungen: Wenn eine Sekte verkündet, dass sie ein Heilmittel gefunden habe, wie reagierst Du: Hast Du genug Geld um die Bevölkerung zu informieren, dass das gelogen ist und dämmst die Ansteckungen damit ein? Oder stimmst du deren Aussagen zähneknirschend zu, was zur Folge hat das Du zwar eine kostbare Probe für die Forschung gewinnst, dafür aber die Ausbreitung des Krankheit-Errergers in Kauf nimmst?
Zwischendrin sollte man im Technologiebaum eine neue Technologie erforschen, die unterschiedlichste Auswirkungen hat: Effektivere Forschung, mehr Personal, mehr Geld, Schutz für Spezialisten etc.
Man wird während eines Szenarios niemals alle Technologien erforschen können und sollte das immer den Begebenheiten anpassen.
Für jedes Szenario gibt es drei wählbare Schwierigkeitsgrade und ein einfaches Szenario dauert ca. 20 Minuten, also kann man das auch mal zwischendrin spielen. Es gibt allerdings lediglich nur 5 Szenarien und keine Kampagne oder Story-Line. Daher fehlt ein wenig die Langzeit-Motivation. Das Spiel ist recht einfach zu verstehen und könnte sogar als Handy-Game herhalten, was ich nicht negativ meine.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003235040', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1545906475}
review:
게임의 규칙이 단순하고 볼륨이 크지 않아 두번정도만 플레이해보시면 이 게임으로 할수있는건 다 해보실 수 있으실 겁니다.

비슷하게 질병을 막는 게임인 팬데믹과 비교하면
도시 수는 팬데믹보다 적은데 요원의 이동 가능한 거리는 팬데믹보다 많아 맵이 작다는 느낌을 크게 받습니다.

그리고 질병이 전염 형식으로 인접한 도시를 통해서만 전염되기 때문에 발병지역과 인접한 도시들을 빠르게 격리시키기만 하면 게임이 루즈해지는 경우가 생깁니다.

태평양을 횡단하는 길은 없기 때문에 질병이 아시아쪽이나 미국 서부쪽에서 발병되면 격리시키기 더 쉬울겁니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039880852', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1545823842}
review:
Если кратко: 
"Игра которая на первый взгляд кажется обратной стороной Plague Inc, игрой где нам нужно бороться с эпидемией, на поверку оказывается куском скучного rовна с геймплеем на 20-40 минут от силы."

Если чуть более подробно:
Quarantine сложно назвать игрой, так как самого геймплея тут практически нет.
Дерево исследований из 12 практически бесполезных бонусов.
Длительность сессии 10-20 минут, из-за чего нет простора и вариантативности.
Практически нету различий между разновидностями человеческих напастей.
Эвентовых событий настолько мало что хватит пальцев на руках чтобы их пересчитать, а выбор методов борьбы с ними еще скуднее.

В общем если вы заинтересовались этой игрой потому что играли ранее в Plague Inc, то смело проходите мимо, тут нет практически ничего кроме красивой картинки.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128220630', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1545750131}

review: I paid a dollar for this game and feel ripped off. It has none of the fun of similar games like Pandemic. It's boring, repetative, slow, random, and far from logical. If a disease has infected 3 cites, the world shouldn't end. No one is going to buy this game anyway, so I won't go in depth. Stay away from this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561197968611839', 'num_games_owned': 2619, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1544927194}
review:
I purchased this thinking it'd be an actual game.


Turns out, no matter the difficulty, simply set up shop, upgrade to get money, hire people, get researchers and quarantine the hell out of everything to stop the spread and keep getting samples from 0/n defeated areas with no risk, to keep leveling then you can destroy a city infection in a single turn.

It's too easy. It lacks content. I paid $1 and I feel like I paid too much as there are 99 cent games out there which are much much better, not to mention free games which are also better.

author: {'steamid': '76561198342521212', 'num_games_owned': 122, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 456, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 363, 'last_played': 1545093637}
review:
He jugado un buen rato y lo primero que tengo que decir es que cumple su función: entretiene.

Lo he jugado después del acceso anticipado y me lo he encontrado bien pulido, sin bugs ni errores (importante, dado que parece ser que en el acceso anticipado si los tenía). Sobre su complejidad, no le pidas demasiado, misiones cortas pero entretenidas, poca variedad pero que da para jugar unas cuantas horas. Si está en oferta y te gustan los juegos de gestión con misiones cortas ni te lo pienses, dale la oportunidad.

Suelo jugar a juegos con muchas más opciones y complejidad, pero un juego de estas características entre dos profundos e inmersivos lo prefiero. Por resumir, no es lo mejor del género ni lo pretende, juego entretenido que tiene su aliciente y que te entretiene con misiones cortas pero intensas.

Un saludo. (5,5/10)* 

* No es una mala nota, pero me niego a dar a cualquier videojuego valoraciones de 8 en cuanto me gusten y entretienen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198802312033', 'num_games_owned': 107, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1543150422}
review:
我又来评测救援类游戏了。有很多人拿这个游戏和瘟疫公司比，其实并不恰当，这游戏更像是桌游瘟疫危机。很多人说这游戏可玩性很低，其实我觉得至少要比瘟疫危机基础版好一点吧。加入了随机事件和科技（虽然数量很有限。16个科技和十个左右的随机事件吧），而且PC游戏不需要进行麻烦的初始设置。瘟疫危机现在也已经出了PC版，大家可以自行体验一下。https://store.steampowered.com/app/622440/Pandemic_The_Board_Game/。                    （温馨提示，这游戏没什么可玩性，而且承诺的中文版现在还没出来。）好，我们继续说Quarantine这游戏。虽然它比瘟疫危机好一点，但其实也没多少可玩性。重复操作特别多。整个游戏一局的流程就是派你你角色移动到某个地方，执行某个行动。（可选的行动只有5个。只有5个哦。）.执行完行动也只会给出成功或者失败的提示。然后再把角色派到另一个地方，执行另一个行动。（也是只有同样的5种行动可以选择。）再点一下科技，处理一下高度重复的随机事件。整个游戏也就是这样了。
综上所述，这游戏原价入绝对不值，降到10元以下的时候，桌游爱好者，战棋游戏爱好者以及救援题材爱好者可以考虑入一个。其他人群绝对不推荐这游戏我给5分吧。（没有以上三类爱好的人群请自己减分。）

author: {'steamid': '76561198018397202', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1541291743}
review: I bought this game expecting something like the Pandemic board game, and it looks like this is what Quarantine is trying to be as close to without infringing on copyright. Though it is a turn-based game, it somehow feels like it is slower than it needs to be, and it makes me crave the excitement of Pandemic or Plague Inc. The art style is fantastic, but the aesthetic seems too clean for a game centered around disease - No triage centers full of the dead and dying, no riots outside of select events, and no general breakdown of society you see in Plague Inc. The gameplay leaves me wanting; There never seems to be any sense of urgency or fanfare for succeeding in curing the disease; The game just ends and you go back to the main menu. The premise is good, but it needs some more features and, in my opinion, an aesthetic change. Neutral recommendation.

review: Да. Однообразно. Да от вируса к вирусу мы занимаемся одним и тем же. Да, стратегия борьбы как правила одна и таже. author: {'steamid': '76561198346771707', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 315, 'last_played': 1549105321}
review: 还是觉得瘟疫公司好玩点，虽然一个即时，一个回合制。瘟疫公司玩法多点，这个除了病毒名称不一样，没看出不同关卡哪里有不同。脑残党只能玩简单模式了。关卡好像有点少，还是我搞错了？36块有点贵啊，特价再入吧。但还是推荐一下。

author: {'steamid': '76561198035059542', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1596962503}
review:
This game has good mechanics, decent graphics and sound, and is a good puzzle.  Very similar to the mobile game Plague, except from the human perspective rather than the disease's perspective.

The game is very challenging, has short games of between 10 and 40 rounds per game, and is usually fairly predictable in outcome after the first few rounds (ie: you're either getting things in hand, or they're escalating out of control too fast to handle).

It's a good quick time filler, but won't hold your attention for very long. 

Overall for the price, it's not bad value at all, if you don't mind some quick entertainment that doesn't need much committment from you for whatever reason.

author: {'steamid': '76561198237073970', 'num_games_owned': 431, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1529759671}
review:
本来以为这个游戏会是和瘟疫公司差不多的一款游戏，结果只能算是个弟弟，原价买还是不值得。
这游戏内容还是太单调，也有许多不合理的地方，造成它并没有突出“对抗全球性疾病”的特点，倒不如说把全球性疾病换成全球恐怖主义威胁更符合这个游戏的玩法。说一下几点感受：
1.基于城市的移动点数系统。游戏中，玩家操纵的小人每回合能基于其移动点数在城市间移动。如果这个游戏把地图以六边形格子划分，行动点数会是一个可行的系统。但它把地图用城市划分，城市的密度也不均匀，结果就是从南美洲最南端到非洲最南端和从成都到北京花费同样的行动点数。
2.这个游戏发生在一个天圆地方的世界中，世界的尽头之外是无尽的虚空。这就是为什么你从南美到非洲要走太平洋，以及你为什么不能通过白令海峡从亚洲到美洲。
3.基于特工的行为系统并不适合抗击全球性流行病的故事背景，反而更像是彩虹小队在全球处理恐怖事件。游戏中你得去招募小人，然后让小人移动到特定的城市完成你需要的工作，就好像这个世界没有基层的医疗从业人员和全球的疫情交流系统，只有你招募的人会治病，而且还没办法编辑治疗手册指导其他医生。这更像彩虹六号的回合制版本，毕竟反恐得要干员亲自上场。
4.学会了我大哥的运营，剩下的就是F2A了。这是个打运营的游戏，至少就低难度来说，一个字，偷。直接裸双开，看情况开矿，最后余钱根本花不完，等研究就完事了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198290881302', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1529666244}
review: 瘟疫公司反向玩法，没有亮点，已申请退款

author: {'steamid': '76561198041011104', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 577, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 425, 'last_played': 1535937478}
review:
Shallow as a puddle.  Surprisingly polished for a puddle.  Presentation wise, it's rather nice.  Lil' bit of fine voice work, pleasing to the eye, no serious UI gripes, a quality art style.  The one thing it gets wrong is general game design.  Very few actual options in how to approach victory which is a pity, there is space for more variety in character and tactics but the opportunity is wasted.  Some RPG elements could easily be put into this, but no.

Difficulty is lopsided.  Either roflstompingly Easy or absurd death by randomization Hard.  Amusing for a couple hours at best.  Worth $10?  Eh, not really.  Maybe if it is like 50 - 75% off.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051965920', 'num_games_owned': 156, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1528756211}
review:
Quarentine es un juego de estrategia en el que debemos contener una amenaza de salud global. Hay que luchar contra la propagación de una enfermedad al tiempo que buscamos la cura. Surgen situaciones aleatorias en ciudades en las que debemos intervenir y decidir cómo actuar, pudiendo tener consecuencias. El juego se desarrolla por turnos en los que actuamos nosotros y luego la enfermedad.

Es un buen juego de estrategia, pero con escaso contenido. Aburre pronto. Parece un juego para tablet en su simpleza.

Yo lo compré a 2 euros. Por ese precio está bien. Pero no me gastaría más en él.

author: {'steamid': '76561198274126943', 'num_games_owned': 625, 'num_reviews': 545, 'playtime_forever': 87, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1528604548}

review:
Boring.

Lacks depth in tech tree, team size, movement spaces. Very basic game.

Easy setting - Booooring
Medium setting - destroyed me every time

Lack of depth = limited paths to success. Felt like the only way to win on higher difficulty was to fluke it. Never felt like I was in control of the outcomes. Too many random events screwed my strategies.

Boring. Refund.

author: {'steamid': '76561198286693064', 'num_games_owned': 321, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1528106436}
review:
打折10元入手的小游戏（感觉就像是个小游戏），画面精致，很有创意和特色，通过一个国际组织（并非全人类？）的努力，赚取资金，雇佣特工，医学研究，从病毒手中解救受害者（与瘟疫公司的游戏流程相反），是一款世界观积极向上的小游戏。但是这个游戏整体流程太短且单一，缺乏变化，相比价格如果不打折还是有些不值。希望制作方能够丰富游戏内容，把这个游戏能越做越好！
      个人愚见,望诸君酌之。

author: {'steamid': '76561198108664657', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 599, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 292, 'last_played': 1589251186}
review:
Es un juego muy corto, pero si lo compras por menos de 1 dolar esta bien.

La dinamica es similar al plague Inc. pero con dos diferencias:
1) En vez de enfermar al mundo hay que curarlo.
2) La cantidad de escenarios y rejugabilidad es increiblemente mas escasa en Quarantine, y eso que toman buena parte de la información de plague Inc.

Repito: solo lo recomiendo por menos de 1 dolar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198273036809', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 297, 'last_played': 1523459497}
review:
[h1]Этой игре не хватает глубины.[/h1]
Идея хорошая, вроде все есть, но в очень урезанном виде.
Есть найм агентов, но их мало и они невыразительные, всего по одной способности на героя.
Есть инженерный отдел, но всего по 4 теха на 4 ветки.
Есть мутации, но их также мало и они какие-то однотипные, нет комбинаций, а для их исследования нужны одни и те-же образцы, можно было сделать интереснее как процесс сбора и изучения образцов, так и влияние этих мутаций. 
Есть случайные события…..мало, однотипно.
Есть сценарии…….мало, однотипно.
Есть мастерская, но за все время после выхода игры появилось всего пару сценариев.
В итоге игра выглядит куцей, часок другой поиграть можно, но не более.
[b]Оставляет неприятное впечатление обмана, когда обертка описания не соответствует содержанию игры, своих денег явно не стоит.[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198086544513', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 545, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 266, 'last_played': 1602406115}

В игре нет отметок того, что уже пройденно. В игре очень плохой баланс. Спасать планету от заразы скучней чем играть в роли этой заразы.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036594140', 'num_games_owned': 245, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 256, 'last_played': 1618012802}
review:
I really want to recommend this game, I really do, but is has so many problems I cannot in good conscious recommend this to anyone.

The game itself is very much bare bones without much replayability. It gets repetitive and tiresome after a while without much to do. The disease operates as if it is conscious and will typically choose the best option that it can within' its power regardless of the difficulty level. Don't get me wrong, I can do most scenarios on the hardest difficulty with the right strategy, but it is very offputting that the pathogen's AI makes the best choices it possibly can. IE you have it virtually entirely contained but 1 set of cities leads the pathogen open so it will infect the city to escape quarantine and immediately spend all of its actions stretching as far away from your operatives and containment as it can.

Maybe in the future I will come back to it and if it has more content for replayability and the AI is toned down or randomized a bit, then I will recommend it. Although if it is on sale or well within' your price range, it is worth a try.

4-9-21: Came back to the game and didn't really find any improvement. In face the game crashes a lot. It was pretty bare bones before but the constant crashes now just make it unplayable.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965004407', 'num_games_owned': 565, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1515293355}

author: {'steamid': '76561198045706509', 'num_games_owned': 901, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 698, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 698, 'last_played': 1514268902}
review:
A single-player turn-based strategy game that takes inspiration from the cooperative board game, Pandemic. You’re a team of medical professionals trying to save the world from a deadly disease that is spreading rapidly. It’s not a terrible game, but in the end, I’d rather be playing Pandemic.

PROS:
* Simple mechanics - It takes only a few minutes to learn how to play and the controls are intuitive.
* Art design - Well styled interface with nice details such as the screen tinting red when the disease has nearly overtaken the world.

CONS:
* Shallow strategy - There’s not much complexity to the decisions you’ll make in this game. A veteran strategy gamer is likely to sniff out a winning strategy quickly. I found I didn’t have to change my strategy much at all regardless of which disease I was fighting.
* Repetitive - There’s also not much variety to the game play. There are five diseases to defeat, but they seem more alike than different. The more interesting part is the random crisis situations that must be resolved by making a multiple choice decision. Unfortunately these situations are too infrequent and isolated to overcome the banality of the rest of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075915484', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1547994220}
review:
이 게임에서 플레이어의 역활은 Plague Inc의 반대입장이지만 전반적인 게임이 비슷하다는 느낌을 받습니다.

그래서 둘중하나를 고르라면 Plague Inc: Evolved를 추천합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039824335', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 65, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1512603259}
review:
疫病と戦うゲームということで、興味のあるテーマなので買ってみましたが、全く深みのないゲームです。

自分の駒を動かして、各都市に移動させて、治療や検疫を行って病気を封じ込めるだけ。
あとは研究開発もありますが、単に何を研究するか選ぶだけです。

病気がテーマという意味も全く活かされていないし、
ゲーム性はすごろくレベル。

無料とか100円くらいのスマホゲームならありかなというレベルです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198042668182', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1585039559}
review:
I hesitate to recommend this game, but if people are dropping a bunch of money on Candy Crush, Battlefront 2 (2017), numerous DLCs, Season Passes, and spending $40-$60 on multiplayer only games that'll be defunct in a year or 3 then I think I can recommend this little game for $5 (usual price is $10).

The game is like a reverse Pandemic, instead of playing the disease you play the people trying to stop the disease (no Madagascar being an eternal safezone though).  Having only played on medium though the game is challenging enough at first but gets more managable as you play more.  If enough cities get infected it's game over or if you find the cure you win.

There are 4 different classes, security, business, medic, and scientist.  Security are good at quarantining cities to keep disease out or from spreading.  Business will let you build offices (aka money makers) for half price.  Medics can treat infections in cities more effectively.  Scientists will collect more samples which will allow you to make the cure for the disease.  Each class can do every task, but some do the job much better than others.  You also get technology that will hinder the disease and/or power up your abilities.

It's very simple looking and requires quite a bit of imagination in terms of graphics.  You can also name the disease you fight, so there's some humor to be had with some silly names (use your imagination).  The cities have a red circle that fills up with the disease and quarantined cities have a white border around them with a greenish tint.  The only thing that can give you some sense of what's happening in the situations that arise, sometimes it will give you a chance to get a jump on the disease other times it basically takes away your money to put out small fires before they possibly become big ones.  

So it's not very deep and you could probably find something similar on a free flash games website, but there's also the steam workshop so you could mod this game some.   

If you were playing Pandemic 2 and wanting to fight your disease instead of killing everyone this is the game for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198186768742', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1510210290}
review:
한줄 요약: 할인할 때 사서 플레이한 뒤 지루할 때 환불을 요청하면 바로 환불될 정도로 매력이 부족하다.

Plague Inc.(이하 전염병 주식회사)의 수비 버전이긴 한데 짝퉁 겜은 되고싶지 않은 모양인지 맛(?)이 많이 다르다. 

하지만 그 맛이 전염병 주식회사보다도 안땡긴다. 그 이유를 보자.

1. 전염병 주식회사는 실시간으로 바뀌는 수치를 보고 판단해야 하는 게임이지만, 이 게임은 턴제 전략게임이다. 질병의 전파에 따른 긴박성이 이 게임에서는 별로 보이지 않는다. 대신 뱀파이어의 개같은 이동 범위와 속도의 끔찍한 맛만 느껴진다. 심지어 차단 능력자들의 기동성이 안좋아서(특히 이동력 1짜리) 더더욱 그렇게 느껴진다. 그리하여 질병이 쭉쭉 전파되면 무력감만 느껴진다. 치료 속도도 전염병 주식회사 특유의 쭉쭉 늘어나는 맛은 전혀 느껴지지 않는다.
2. 전염병 주식회사는 국가간 차이를 두어 그에 따른 요소를 고려하게끔 만들지만, 여기에선 무시당한다. 대신 여기서는 의사가 병을 임시로 치료하거나, 도시를 통제하는 등의 요소를 도입한다. 헌데 이 요소들이 너무 제한적이라 쓸데없이 게임이 애매해진다.
3. 전염병 주식회사는 반드시 전부 죽여야 한다. 이 게임은 일정량의 주민이 감염되면 그냥 그대로 끝난다. 의사로 혐영하는 것을 막으려는 조치 같지만, 감염이 상당히 지나고나서 부터는 중복 감염이 진행되게 바꾸면 될 일이다.
4. 전염병 주식회사는 치사(병으로 죽는 것)가 있지만 이 게임은 없다. 대신 도시가 전복당하면 그 도시를 잃은 것으로 판정한다. 헌데 잃은 도시도 병을 잘만 전파하고 있다. 대체 뭐지?
5. 전염병 주식회사는 각 특성의 연관성을 어느정도 연계해놨는데, 여기선 아무래도 상관이 없다. 기술 연구는 1자로만 연결되어 있다. 전염병 주식회사에 있는 몇몇 질낮은 유저 시나리오에서 이런 방식을 채택한다. 그리고 질병 연구는 아무거나 골라도 연구가 가능한데, 애매하기 짝이 없다.
6. 이벤트도 애매하다. X지선다에 랜덤성을 추가로 제공한 모양새인데, 성공한 것과 실패한 것의 컷씬의 차이가 별달리 느껴지지 않으며, 분명 '이 대처로 어떤 일이 일어날 지 모릅니다'라고 썼지만 아무 영향도 없다. 랜덤 보상조차도 아닌 것 같다. 이럴려면 그냥 '상황 진정' 같은거 써넣으면 된다.

전염병 주식회사의 단점과 비슷한 것도 있다.

1. 역시 태평양은 저어얼대 건너지 않는다. 가로질러가는 도로 자체가 없다.
2. 오역이 쩔어준다. 처음에 일견 좋아보이는 한글화를 보고 안심했다가 통수맞았다.

웃긴건 이게 에볼라 업데이트 이후 많이 나아졌다는게 이거라는 것이다. 굉장히 안좋은 징조다.

외국인들이 지적한 바 중에는 실질적으로 취하는 방안이 치료 또는 격리 둘 중 하나밖에 없다는 비판이 있는데, 굉장히 공감된다. 나머지 3가지 행동은 할 수는 있지만 별로 매력적이지 않기 때문이다.

아 그리고 한글화 했다고 했는데 구글번역기 돌려놓으면 한국인 입장에서는 알아먹을 수 없는 어휘가 매우 많이 튀어나온다. 부디 구글번역기로 번역하는 일만큼은 없기를.

환불하러 간다.
